attributes.action: get upto date with the rest of europe on cannabis legalization
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Belgium Decriminalizes Marijuana for Personal Use, Users Must Grow Their Own or Buy it in the Netherlands, Says Government.
The Belgian government decriminalized the use and possession of small amounts of marijuana. In so doing, it joined a number of other European Union countries where the use and possession of marijuana is de facto tolerated, including the Netherlands, Switzerland, Italy, Spain, and Portugal.
